While credited as a Tom and Jerry cartoon, this is not the cat-and-mouse team but an earlier Mutt-and-Jeff rip-off featuring them going about to survive in today's turbulent economy. In the end, Jerry MEA Culpa-here foretold by The Gopher  takes payback at Arthur Tuttleby by destroying his million dollar machine which produced widgets for two cents each (supply > demand), whilst leaving him a penniless shopkeeper.

Michael Dudikoff stars as Joe Armstrong a martial artist who fights ninjas who are stealing weapons from the U.S Army, in this entertaining yet admittedly brainless comedic action film. This film is typical of the type of program churned out by Italian action movie production companies, but it ultimately works because there are enough tongue-in-cheek and cornball moments to make it hilarious fun at times.
